summary: SummaryDearcloud's signature Matcha Milky Whip Facial Cleanser helps effectively remove makeup and excess impurities. Powered by Allantoin and BHA to help decrease the appearance of blemishes and dullness.
details: DetailsBenefitsHelps cleanse makeup, excess impurities, dirt, and toxinsEffective pore-detox without stripping excess oilsSuitable for all skin types and sensitive skinMade in KoreaKey IngredientsCollagen: Helps plump and firm for a bouncy-smooth finishAlgae: Helps retain moisture levels and promotes a youthful radianceNiacinamide: Helps minimize the appearance of pores, redness, and blemishesFormulated WithoutParabenSulfateItem 2625741How To UseApply to damp skin and massage in circular motions for 30-60 seconds.Use lukewarm water and rinse.Use daily, morning and night.Precautions: For external use only. Effectiveness may vary per skin type. BHA is a potent ingredient for targeting blemishes. Follow with moisturizer and sunscreen. Stop use immediately and consult a physician if problems occur after use.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butylene Glycol, Dipropylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Polyacrylate-13, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Arginine, Carbomer, Polyisobutene, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Betaine, Trehalose, Polysorbate 60, Ethylhexylglycerin, Allantoin, Fragrance, Polysorbate 20, Sorbitan Isostearate, Disodium EDTA, Niacinamide, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Fragaria Chiloensis (Strawberry) Fruit Extract, Rubus Fruticosus (Blackberry) Fruit Extract, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Extract, Ribes Nigrum (Black Currant) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Royal Jelly Extract, Propolis Extract, Algae Extract, Lactobacillus Ferment, Leuconostoc Ferment Filtrate.
how_to_use: Apply to damp skin and massage in circular motions for 30-60 seconds.Use lukewarm water and rinse.Use daily, morning and night.Precautions: For external use only. Effectiveness may vary per skin type. BHA is a potent ingredient for targeting blemishes. Follow with moisturizer and sunscreen. Stop use immediately and consult a physician if problems occur after use.

reviews.headline: CALM, CLEAN, AND CLOUD-LIKE
reviews.comments: foam feels like a cloud and soothes while clarifying. BHA tackles impurities, fruit extracts smooth, and collagen gives gentle bounce. cleansed skin, elevated mood.

reviews.headline: radiant reset button
reviews.comments: a quick 60-sec massage and skin feels refreshed, brighter, and happily balanced. texture is silky, scent is subtle, and my complexion looks healthier.

reviews.headline: smooth skin, no hassle
reviews.comments: this cleanser lathers nicely and rinses clean. BHA gave me smoother texture, niacinamide minimized my pores, and algae preserved plumpness. simple perfection.

reviews.headline: hydrating and healing in one
reviews.comments: gentle yet effective‚Äîmakeup, oil, and dullness all gone. niacinamide helps redness fade, collagen adds bounce, and centella's calming effect is real. zero dryness.

reviews.headline: SUN-KISSED CLEANSER VIBES
reviews.comments: coconut-derived emollients leave skin soft even after rinsing. BHA smooths, algae locks in moisture, and fruit extracts give a fresh, lifted feeling. daytime joy in a bottle.

reviews.headline: a gentle glow upgrade
reviews.comments: the matcha whip texture is so light, creamy, and soothing. faded dullness, reduced pores, no tightness. plus, centella got my sensitive skin cheering.

reviews.headline: softening, brightening, winning
reviews.comments: allantoin and niacinamide team up for calmer, brighter skin. fruit extracts make it subtly fragrant and collagen keeps things hydrated. this cleanse is a winner.

reviews.headline: whipped clean
reviews.comments: the foam feels silky, clean but not tight. BHA clears blemishes, centella soothes, and raspberry & blueberry bring gentle antioxidants. radiant skin, zero irritation.

reviews.headline: CLARITY WITHOUT DRYNESS
reviews.comments: removes everything (even stubborn makeup) without stripping‚Äînice! niacinamide calms redness, fruit extracts add dewiness, and collagen keeps skin plump. texture stays smooth.

reviews.headline: matcha and mildness in harmony
reviews.comments: this cleanser is a sweet, gentle treat‚Äîmatcha's glow meets BHA's clarity. my makeup melts away, pores look softer, and redness calms. my daily skincare spa, for real.

reviews.headline: Skincare disguised as cleanser
reviews.comments: Full of nourishing ingredients‚Äîpropolis, royal jelly, centella, probiotics‚Äîthis cleanser feels like a serum. Perfect double cleanse starter, and it never over-drys or flares my skin.

reviews.headline: All the glow, none of the grease
reviews.comments: Hydrolyzed collagen and algae give a soft radiance that's noticeable. I love the whipped texture‚Äîit feels lightweight yet hydrating. Skin always looks bright and feels soothed.

reviews.headline: Gentle, yet effective
reviews.comments: Despite the inclusion of BHA and botanical extracts, this never irritates. My sensitive skin stays calm and balanced. No stinging, just a soft, clean finish every time.

reviews.headline: Bye blemishes!
reviews.comments: Salicylic acid + niacinamide combo is SO GOOD. My breakouts and redness have faded since I started using this daily. And it smells faintly herbal‚Äînot overpowering. Such a winner.

reviews.headline: Matcha foam magic ‚òÅÔ∏è
reviews.comments: This cleanser is like whipped matcha latte for your skin. It dissolves makeup effortlessly, rinses clean, and leaves no tight or dry feeling. My fave mornings go-to for soft, fresh skin after cleansing.

reviews.headline: Excellent for my Skin
reviews.comments: This cleanser foams and cleans nicely! I have blotchy flaky skin, but not anymore thanks to this product! Doesn't leave my skin tight or dry feeling. Smells nice!

reviews.headline: I love love love this product
reviews.comments: It was safe to use on my acne prone sensitive dry skin, that was a big yes for me. Your skin afterwards feel so clean and it doesnt give you that "tight" drying feeling. My skin felt so refreshed after one use, i love this product!

reviews.headline: Not for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: This says for sensitive skin‚Ä¶ I have oily skin and this BURNED my face. Anything else on the face after BURNS even hydrating soothing products. Love the feel but I need to stop using.

reviews.headline: dream cleanser for dry skin
reviews.comments: I've tried so many cleansers and they either dry me out or feel like nothing. This is the sweet spot. Creamy, hydrating, and rinses clean. I'm already on my second tube üíñ

reviews.headline: soft, simple, and smells good
reviews.comments: It's the perfect everyday cleanser. Gentle enough for my sensitive skin, but still effective. Also, the subtle scent is super calming‚Äîlike skincare ASMR.

faceoff_positive.comments: I have incredibly dry and sensitive skin‚ÄîI used to use Boscia prior to them closing their business. From a product standpoint, the price point is reasonable on this and it lasts forever. It's a very thick and creamy product with an amazing light, spa-like scent, and you get an amazing lather with it (I pair it with my Foreo Luna and a dime-size dollop creates endless suds). This gives you a refreshingly deep clean, but is gentle enough to use every day. I usually apply dearcloud's New/Youth Collagen Cream after washing my face, and the results are amazing. The duo has taken years off of my skin and my once dry skin has a plump bouncy feeling that I notice both in the mirror and when I'm applying my makeup. I've tried a lot of skincare and have even fallen into some trends (hello, Drunk Elephant) dearcloud has given me the best results at a fraction of the price. Try this one, you won't be disappointed!
faceoff_positive.headline: Top Shelf Results at a Drugstore Price

faceoff_negative.comments: bought this on a whim..affordable,cute packaging. I have combo,dry,acne prone skin. I thought it would be a good gentle cleanser, especially being korean brand but I was 100% wrong. it was foaming and had a nice texture but it was like..drying when I was washing my face. like I was using hand soap or bar soap. afterwards My fave was literally SQUEEKY  clean. literally. it would be good for maybe a deep clean or maybe oily skin types for summer. it also says make up remover and it did not do that. at all. I had to go back in with my regular Cetaphil daily cleanser to get the rest of my powder off. I didn't even have a lot on. I have the bare minimum of make up on. barley a layer. I would not recommend unless you need a deeeeepppp clean.
faceoff_negative.headline: it cleans too good...
